title: hi i have to buy laptop but is this laptop can run lol
body:
i got my used laptop from brother and use it like 3 years. it goes wrong yesterday. i went to repair shop and they said , mother board is gone and can't fixed it.so aim looking for laptop and found this tosiba from dick smith. here is the spec.
11.6" HD Widescreen with LED display
Intel速 Celeron速 N2820 Processor, Dual Core (2.13Ghz, Up to 2.39GHz)

replies.body:
It should be able to play the game quite decently. 

I play on a very low-quality (you could go as far as to say 'primitive') Macbook, and it runs well.

Um yeah. That's more suited for editing Word documents and not much else.

You could try installing Windows 7 onto it to make it a tad faster, but, eh. Depends on how much effort you want to commit.

That screen size lol. 
Probably should play without other programs open with that CPU.
Doubt the integrated graphics is good enough though.
"Run" LOL might be a stretch, I'd describe it more like "a leisurely walk"
